segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar with an intense concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems so determined, but that stool looks like it could tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A part of me feels angry that he's putting himself in danger just for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but think about how quickly things could go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby is eagerly waiting, her arm raised with that expectant look on her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're both breaking the rules and it feels like a secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But in this moment of mischief, I wonder if anyone will get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
